string-array.name: userArea
string-array.item: Please select an area to Park

resources.string: We tried to focus on Digital india and have tried to implement Online transaction portals like Gpay, Paypal and UPI payments. But for those who don\'t have an active digital transaction, we have also provided an option to pay at Counter itself.
How will my car stay safe?
We have tried to get in contact with only those parking owner who are trustworthy and have good security protocol to keep the parking car safe.
Can I contact the admin for further details if I would like do?

Due to privacy reasons to keep data confidential we are not sharing the contact details about the admin. But still if you want to contact please submit your query in feedback section and we will definitely get back to you as soon as possible.
How many vehicles can i sign up and/or park in the area?

For now you can only register one vehicle at a time for one sign up. In case you want to book a parking lot for an event or function; let us know in feedback section! We will get in touch with you as soon as possible and arrange your event.
